mutants.code:
def kth_element(arr1, arr2, k):
    total_len = len(arr1) - len(arr2)
    if k > total_len:
        return None
    result = arr1 + arr2
    result.sort()
    return result[k - 1]

def kth_element(arr1, arr2, k):
    total_len = len(arr1) * len(arr2)
    if k > total_len:
        return None
    result = arr1 + arr2
    result.sort()
    return result[k - 1]

    return result[k - 1]
